thread.title: Voices: Mark Zoril, on Using Videoconferencing to Serve More Clients
thread.title_full: Voices: Mark Zoril, on Using Videoconferencing to Serve More Clients - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Mark Zoril, on Using Videoconferencing to Serve More Clients
text:
Voices is an occasional feature in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. Mark Zoril is the founder of PlanVision in Minneapolis.
Unless you’re working with high-net-worth individuals, you need a lot of clients to sustain your business. And to get a high number of clients, you have to price your services competitively. However, keeping service prices low and maintaining a high client volume is ultimately unsustainable if you’re running your practice with a lot of face-to-face... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
